resources.string: You are not connected to a device
Bluetooth was not enabled. Leaving Bluetooth Chat.

string.name: instructions1
string.b:
1. Switch on phone's bluetooth 
 2. Select start from the main menu 
 3. go to options and scan for devices 
 4. Select a device from the list 
 5. It will ask you permission on both the devices to pair up 
 6. Once the "connected" status appears you can start sending text to the other device



 note: This app cannot work on an emulator since there is no bluetooth support provided by android sdk. It can however be run on android devices in debugger mode

string.name: about1
string.b:
This app helps people to communicate between android devices like phones, tablets, computers, etc over the bluetooth technology.
 This is a very useful application which does not require network access. Simple and faster way of sending messages
